title: Riot Gear Skins
body:
Is Riot ever going to have to Riot Gear skins available again?
Are they ever going to be available at the ingame store?
I really hope that Riot brings them back, imo they're some of the greatest skins, and I'd love to get them.

replies.body: First of all, none of the skins have gear in their name. Secondary, Riot Squad Singed is the only one that isn't legacy so it won't come back for good or at least for a long time
yes, probably. considering they're all legacy. or at least blitz and kayle are.
